event.title: was explored by fur trader Alexander Ross in 1824

data.event: The Bellevue area was explored by fur trader Alexander Ross in 1824.
Bellevue was settled and chartered in 1882.

event.title: 1881 and the 1893 crash of the silver market, the mines near Bellevue produced

data.event: Between 1881 and the 1893 crash of the silver market, the mines near Bellevue produced more than $60 million worth of silver, lead and gold.

event.title: included Keystone, Palmas, Antelope, Big Camus, Phoenix, Paymaster, Silver Tide, and Monday

data.event: Some of Bellevue's mines included Keystone, Palmas, Antelope, Big Camus, Phoenix, Paymaster, Silver Tide, and Monday Mine.
